name: Lava Real Estate Manager
author: lavacode

sections.description:
Lava real estate manager plugin is for preperty

This plugin enables you to use the power and flexibility of WordPress to generate optimized pages for your real estate listings.

Intro page : http://lava-code.com/real-estate/

Documentation : http://lava-code.com/real-estate/documentation/

Demo site : http://lava-code.com/real-estate-demo/

Languages

It is currently (v0.1) available only English version. we are happy to have volunteer to assist to translate in your own languages.

https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/lava-real-estate-manager/

Arabic, German, Korean ready.
Thank you for Arabic ( Faraj Omar), Jered (Korean), Teneriffa hauskauf ( German)

Please email us at wp.lava.code@gmail.com , if you are interested.
Thank you in advance.
sections.installation:
Install via Search:

  1. In WordPress admin, visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for “lava real estate manager”
  3. Click the “Install Now” link.
  4. Once installed, click the “Activate Plugin” link.
  5. Visit settings to setup pages

Install via Upload:

  1. In WordPress admin, visit “Plugins” > “Add New” > “Upload”
  2. Upload lava-real-estate-manager.zip file
  3. Once uploaded, click the “Activate Plugin” link
  4. Visit settings to setup pages

That’s it!
If you need more documentation, please visit here ( http://lava-code.com/real-estate/documentation/ )
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Install via Search:

  1. In WordPress admin, visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for “lava real estate manager”
  3. Click the “Install Now” link.
  4. Once installed, click the “Activate Plugin” link.
  5. Visit settings to setup pages

Install via Upload:

  1. In WordPress admin, visit “Plugins” > “Add New” > “Upload”
  2. Upload lava-real-estate-manager.zip file
  3. Once uploaded, click the “Activate Plugin” link
  4. Visit settings to setup pages

That’s it!
If you need more documentation, please visit here ( http://lava-code.com/real-estate/documentation/ )

Can I use my existing WordPress theme?

Yes! Lava real estate manager works out-of-the-box with nearly every WordPress theme.

Will this work on WordPress multisite?

Yes! If your WordPress installation has multisite enabled, Lava real estate manager will work on it.

Where can I get support?

We will open our own support site soon. or you can create tickets on wordpress plugin support page.

Where can I find documentation?

Our codex can be found at http://lava-code.com/real-estate/documentation/.

Where can I report a bug?

Report bugs, suggest ideas, and participate in development at wp.lava.code@gmail.com .
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • Fixed : Single property > Enqueue single script issue

1.0.3

  • Improved : Scripts enqueues functions ( wp_localize_script )
  • Fixed : Shortcode > Add property form > Not included submit scripts issue ( Map not working )
  • Improved : Edit property in admin & add submit form in shortcode > Addons fields are not visible issue

1.0.2

  • Added : Added addons update & check functions

1.0.1

  • Release Date – 07. Dec, 2016
  • Added : WordPress 4.7 Compatibility
  • Improve : WPML Post ID Function
  • Fixed : Dashboard > Listings > Settings > Page Options > suppress_filters issue
  • Added : Lava map template > add head hook
  • Improve : Edit page > page template option issue (WP 4.7)

1.0.0

  • Release Date – 01. July, 2016
  • Improved : framework (data)

0.1.6

Release Date – 18. Jan, 2016

  • Fixed : adding extra number taxonomies.
  • Improved : minor style, js

0.1.5

  • Release Date – 24. Nov, 2015*

  • Added : property keywords.

  • Fixed : Add Property > Keyword : id to name
  • Improved : contact author widget

0.1.4

Release Date – 11. Sep, 2015

  • Added : Able to add custom markers (map icons) for property status
  • Improved : Better and missing Style for FlexSlider
  • Fixed : AutoUpdate Json error. (when posts/pages are saved)

0.1.3

Release Date – 30. July, 2015

  • Added : Arabic, Korean, German MO, PO file included
  • Improved : Single Property Page > Map, StreetView Google map API updated.
  • Fixed : Archive Page > error for missing Post ID
  • Fixed : Minor CSS, JS

0.1.2

Release Date – 21. July, 2015

  • Added : WPML String match for translation
  • Fixed : Loading translation files
  • Fixed : Minor CSS, JS

0.1.1

Release Date – 02. July, 2015

  • Added : Removed Map page setting (Settings > Page Settings > Map Page) and added a Map Page Template (Map Template). It’s better to create unlimited map pages.
  • Improved : Single Property > StreetView > Added a notice if the location is not supported by google map API.
  • Fixed : Single Property > Load detail images and description (custom template page) on your own theme
  • Added : Plugin icon, banner and screen shots on wordpress site.

0.1.0

Release Date – 30th Jun, 2015

  • Initial release

short_description: Manage property listings. Provided front-end form, google map support, listing, filtering.
